Description: Roughly almond-shaped artificial eye made from two different types of material. A black stone was inserted to mark the iris. The piece is convex and is covered, on all sides, with patches of resinuous residue. The eye would have originally been placed on the orbit of a mummified individual.
Curator's comments: It is possible that artificial eyes EA 90814 and EA 90815 origianlly formed a pair.
